CpsInfoCircleComponent.description: CpsInfoCircleComponent is a component that provides information by means of the info icon with the tooltip on hover.

props.description: Defines the input properties of the component.

values.name: size
values.description: Size of the icon, it can be of type number denoting pixels, string or 'fill', 'xsmall', 'small', 'normal' or 'large'.

values.name: tooltipText
values.description: Tooltip text to provide more info.

values.name: tooltipPosition
values.description: Position of the tooltip, it can be 'top', 'bottom', 'left' or 'right'.

values.name: tooltipMaxWidth
values.description: Max width of the tooltip of type number denoting pixels or string.

values.name: tooltipPersistent
values.description: Determines whether the tooltip is persistent.
